import React from "react"; import AppBottom from "./bottom/AppBottom"; export default function Widget() { let key = "0d38dd78cfe8683dd6b77aea943f1bbb"; let city = "Jakarta"; let url = `https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${city}&appid=${key}`; return (
Jakarta
